scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main_fixed:app --reload --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main_fixed:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main_fixed:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run build && npm start"
